title: MODS for Ghost Recon (PC 2001)
description:
those are the mods you&#039;ll need to play online at UBI.COM


The Mods Are:

DA49 (Dark angel)(new maps/wepons)
HX5:Codname Red sun(new maps/wepons)
frostbite_full_v1-2(new maps/wepons/missions)
dangerousbabes (new maps/wepons)

********************IMPORTANT********************************

Some of the setups are wierd defalt install folders are wrong

Ghost recon installs by default in 
"C:\Program\Red Storm Entertainment\Ghost Recon"

but some mods atempt to install in 
"C:\Program files\Red Storm Entertainment\Ghost Recon\Mods"

SHANGE IT TO
"C:\Program\Red Storm Entertainment\Ghost Recon\Mods"
**************************************************************
